languages.text: "Дворяне, спасенные вами в звездной гавани, указали координаты укрытий, в которых могут находиться {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}выжившие{/d} аристократы с семьями. Что же касается солдат сержанта Малгара, они помогут организовать толпу напуганных простолюдинов и обезопасить шаттлы от перегрузки".

"The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}surviving{/d} aristocrats and their families. As for Sergeant Malgar's troops, they will help to control the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent the shuttles from being overloaded."
languages.original_text: "Дворяне, спасенные вами в звездной гавани, указали координаты укрытий, в которых могут находиться {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}выжившие{/d} аристократы с семьями. Что же касается солдат сержанта Малгара, они помогут организовать толпу напуганных простолюдинов и обезопасить шаттлы от перегрузки".

traits.locale_text: "The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for Sergeant Malgar's troops, they will help to control the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent the shuttles from being overloaded."

"The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for Sergeant Malgar's troops, they will help to control the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent the shuttles from being overloaded."

"The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for Sergeant Malgar's troops, they will help to control the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent the shuttles from being overloaded."

languages.text: “您在星港救下的那些贵族给出了避难所的坐标，我们可以去那里找到{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}幸存{/d}的贵族和他们的家人。至于平民，马尔加军士的部队会负责引导受到惊吓的民众，防止穿梭机超载。”
languages.original_text: "The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}surviving{/d} aristocrats and their families. As for Sergeant Malgar's troops, they will help to control the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent the shuttles from being overloaded."

traits.locale_text: “您在星港救下的那些贵族给出了避难所的坐标，我们可以去那里找到幸存的贵族和他们的家人。至于平民，马尔加军士的部队会负责引导受到惊吓的民众，防止穿梭机超载。”

languages.text: 「スターポートで救出した貴族から、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}生き残った{/d}貴族とその家族がいる避難所の座標を聞いています。マルガー軍曹の部隊は、怯える一般市民の群れを制御し、シャトルの過負荷を防ぐのに役立つでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}surviving{/d} aristocrats and their families. As for Sergeant Malgar's troops, they will help to control the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent the shuttles from being overloaded."

traits.locale_text: 「スターポートで救出した貴族から、生き残った貴族とその家族がいる避難所の座標を聞いています。マルガー軍曹の部隊は、怯える庶民の群衆を制御し、シャトルの過負荷を防ぐのに役立つでしょう」
「スターポートで救出した貴族から、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}生き残った{/d}貴族とその家族がいる避難所の座標を聞いています。マルガー軍曹の部隊は、怯える一般市民の群れを制御し、シャトルの過負荷を防ぐのに役立つでしょう」

languages.text: "Die Adligen, die Ihr am Raumhafen gerettet habt, haben uns Koordinaten von Verstecken gegeben, wo sich {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}überlebende{/d} Aristokraten und ihre Familien aufhalten. Sergeant Malgars Truppen werden uns helfen, die verängstigten Bürger im Zaum zu halten, damit die Shuttles nicht überladen werden."
languages.original_text: "The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}surviving{/d} aristocrats and their families. As for Sergeant Malgar's troops, they will help to control the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent the shuttles from being overloaded."

traits.locale_text: "Die Adligen, die Ihr am Raumhafen gerettet habt, haben uns Koordinaten von Verstecken gegeben, wo sich überlebende Aristokraten und ihre Familien aufhalten. Sergeant Malgars Truppen werden uns helfen, die verängstigten Bürger im Zaum zu halten, damit die Shuttles nicht überladen werden.

languages.text: « Les nobles que vous avez secourus à l'astroport nous ont donné les coordonnées d'abris dans lesquels se trouvent des aristocrates {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}survivants{/d} et leurs familles. Et les troupes du sergent Malgar pourront nous aider à canaliser les foules de roturiers effrayés et ainsi éviter que les navettes soient prises d'assaut. »
languages.original_text: "The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}surviving{/d} aristocrats and their families. As for Sergeant Malgar's troops, they will help to control the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent the shuttles from being overloaded."

traits.locale_text: « Les nobles que vous avez secourus à l'astroport nous ont donné les coordonnées d'abris dans lesquels se trouvent des aristocrates et leurs familles. Et les troupes du sergent Malgar pourront nous aider à canaliser les foules de roturiers effrayés et ainsi éviter que les navettes soient prises d'assaut. »

languages.text: «Los nobles que rescató en el puerto estelar nos han dado las coordenadas de refugios en los que podremos encontrar a aristócratas {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}supervivientes{/d} y a sus familias. En cuanto a las tropas del sargento Malgar, podrán controlar a la muchedumbre de plebeyos asustados y evitar que sobrecarguen las lanzaderas».
languages.original_text: "The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}surviving{/d} aristocrats and their families. As for Sergeant Malgar's troops, they will help to control the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent the shuttles from being overloaded."

traits.locale_text: «Los nobles que rescató en el puerto estelar nos han dado las coordenadas de refugios en los que podremos encontrar a aristócratas supervivientes y a sus familias. En cuanto a las tropas del sargento Malgar, podrán controlar a la muchedumbre de plebeyos asustados y evitar que sobrecarguen las lanzaderas».

languages.text: "Yıldız limanında kurtardığınız soylular, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}hayatta kalan{/d} aristokratları ve ailelerini bulabileceğimiz sığınakların koordinatlarını verdiler. Çavuş Malgar'ın birlikleri ise korkmuş avam kitlesini kontrol altında tutup mekiklere tıkışmalarını önlemeye yardımcı olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportEveryoneSaved}surviving{/d} aristocrats and their families. As for Sergeant Malgar's troops, they will help to control the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent the shuttles from being overloaded."

traits.locale_text: "Yıldız limanında kurtardığınız soylular, hayatta kalan aristokratları ve ailelerini bulabileceğimiz barınakların koordinatlarını verdi. Çavuş Malgar'ın birlikleri ise korkmuş avam kitlesini kontrol edip mekiklere tıkışmalarını önlemeye yardımcı olacaktır."

"Yıldız limanında kurtardığınız soylular, hayatta kalan aristokratları ve ailelerini bulabileceğimiz sığınakların koordinatlarını verdiler. Çavuş Malgar'ın birlikleri ise korkmuş avam kitlesini kontrol altında tutup mekiklere tıkışmalarını önlemeye yardımcı olacaktır."
